remarks: Unique existence proper of a member of the domain of the greatest lower bound function of a poset.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
statement:
glbval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
glbval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
glbval.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
glbval.p $e |- ( ps <-> ( A. y e. S x .<_ y /\ A. z e. B ( A. y e. S z .<_ y -> z .<_ x ) ) ) $.
glbva.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
glbval.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. dom G ) $.
glbeu $p |- ( ph -> E! x e. B ps ) $.
$d B x z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
